NED: The Netherlands had a solid performance in the Men's 500m at the ISU Short Track World Tour. Jens van 't Wout led the Dutch charge with a strong 6th-place finish, while Itzhak de Laat came in 7th. Teun Boer completed the team effort in 13th place. Despite not reaching the podium, all three skaters demonstrated competitiveness in a high-level field, with van 't Wout and de Laat advancing deep into the rounds.
